alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Columbia; Eastern Greene; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 3:26PM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SUNDAY TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, locally up to 5 inches possible. * WHERE...The Mohawk Valley, the Greater Capital District, Upper Hudson Valley including the Lake George Saratoga region and the northern and central Taconics in eastern New York. The southern Berkshires in western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 7 PM Sunday to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions may impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may reach a half inch up to one inch per hour at times mainly Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling especially during the Monday morning commute.
